channel.title: How to make your website look like www.moparisthebest.com/smf/
channel.description:
[b]Lord Valens ~ one tutorial [/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,101616.msg1030121.html#msg1030121]Making your website look like www.moparisthebest.com/smf/[/url]
[b]step1:[/b]First you need to go to [url=http://www.smfforfree2.com]smf host[/url] and register for an account and confirm your e-mail.
[b]step2:[/b]once you have your default website and domain go to the admin cp and go to the boards section and change the new board and new category to what you want it to be called.
[b]step3:[/b]now you need to go to the promote your forum section and go to the second url down and add your forums to the showcase and also add it to the 3rd url down which is a free submit to google.
[b]step4:[/b]once you have people and posts, lets just say someone breaks your rules by spamming or leeching ok now your looking at that post and your like how do i lock, remove, sticky,merge, Etc. at the bottom right above the quick reply box there will be tabs you can click on them to do that!
[b]step5:[/b]someone's a really good player you wana make them a admin... ok go to their profile and click on primary member group and change it to what group you want them to be in. or you want them mod in oe their only one board go to the board section in admin cp and click on modify on the board you want them to be in and type thier username in on the moderators field near the bottom!
[b]credits:[/b]Lord Valens
[b][u]if anyone thinks i missed something please post here and notify me[/u][/b]

item.title: How to make your website look like www.moparisthebest.com/smf/
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I don’t want this to be as spam, but, Why is this thread still being posted on, when it is already too obvious?

and my dedicated, means the server’s only purpose is to host his website, files and this forum. That is about it. I have my own server which I pay for, and is slightly more powerful than mopar’s server for my account. The machine mine is cappable of hosting more than 800, i don’t know if they maxed out that rack after i bought that space or not, but when it comes to server dedication, the owner must be serious, because it costs more usualy than to host your own, due to having to have fiber optic installed to the server.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make your website look like www.moparisthebest.com/smf/
item.dc:creator: @lord_valens lord valens
item.description:
@lord_valens wrote:

Lord Valens ~ one tutorial
Making your website look like www.moparisthebest.com/smf/

step1:First you need to go to smf host and register for an account and confirm your e-mail.

step2:once you have your default website and domain go to the admin cp and go to the boards section and change the new board and new category to what you want it to be called.

step3:now you need to go to the promote your forum section and go to the second url down and add your forums to the showcase and also add it to the 3rd url down which is a free submit to google.

step4:once you have people and posts, lets just say someone breaks your rules by spamming or leeching ok now your looking at that post and your like how do i lock, remove, sticky,merge, Etc. at the bottom right above the quick reply box there will be tabs you can click on them to do that!

step5:someone’s a really good player you wana make them a admin… ok go to their profile and click on primary member group and change it to what group you want them to be in. or you want them mod in oe their only one board go to the board section in admin cp and click on modify on the board you want them to be in and type thier username in on the moderators field near the bottom!

credits:Lord Valens

if anyone thinks i missed something please post here and notify me

Read full topic
